CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 14, 1953, pg. 23, reads: "HURRICANE - Pittsburghers and out-of-towners alike flocked to the grand opening Monday of the new Hurricane Club at 1603 Centre Avenue. This Exquisite addition to Pittsburgh's night spots lays claim to being one of the most modern restaurant - bars for many miles around.  in top left photo, left to right, are the Hurricane's smiling waitresses, Curren (Corrine) K. Wagner, Gloria Greene, Elois Robinson, Rebecca (Beckey) Jefferson and Mary Ann Walden... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five waitresses, from left: Corrine K. Wagner, Gloria Greene, Elois Robinson, Rebecca "Becky" Jefferson, and Mary Ann Walden, standing in front of curtain with abstract pattern, for Hurricane Club opening
